title: Death Threat Ingame. Did I do the right thing?
body:
I received a death threat from a person in the client chat, after a game. My friend later adds him, tells him I'm still waiting, since I was not worried at all. But he replies with "ill have a gun X hours drive away" "will burn your house down". He has my IP address, which he obtained by tricking me into clicking on a site that had "all my personal info". There was nothing on there, but he got my IP address. 

So I sent a email to Riot explaining what happened and giving them the IGN of me, my friend, and the hacker. 

I sent the email to: 
support@riotgames.com 

Was this the right place to send the email to? So far I have done nothing other than the email.

replies.body:
You should call the police.

And holy %%%%, why would you click a link from someone who sent you a death threat?
I clicked it because I wanted to verify that he wasn't bull %%%%ting. Turns out he was bull %%%%ting. But he seems to be holding on to it for some reason which is why I'm concerned.
Damn, I logged into my NA account by accident. The post above was by me.

lol

But yeah, the sooner you do this the better.
